content: minion hats by lauren irving after the k2tog round cut a tail and weave it through all of the stitches for one eye ch2 8 half_double_crochet in 2nd stitch from hook with black join with a slip_stitch using brown ch2 2 half_double_crochet in each st join with a slip_stitch using white ch1 *single_crochet single_crochet increase* around join with a sl stitch chain 1 *2 single_crochet single_crochet increase* around join with a slip_stitch chain 1 *3 single_crochet single_crochet increase* around join with a slip_stitch using gray for a bigger eye ch1 *4 single_crochet single_crochet increase* around with white - gauge 19 sts x 24 row = 4 but makes less room for a mouth baby hat chain 2 half_double_crochet around join with a slip_stitch child hat 8 5 high x 18-21 around - very stretchy chain 2 *5 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet decrease* around half_double_crochet to end join with a slip_stitch weave in ends adult hat 10 high and 21-23 around for two eyes after 2 single_crochet single_crochet increase row skip to gray round us 8 16 circular and dpns with half_double_crochet make 2 us g hook sew eye s to hat with white yarn over the black band 1 skein of caron slip_stitch yellow will make at least 5 hats mouth 5 yds brown 7 yds white 15 yds blue 20 yds black short mouth chain 9 single_crochet back sew to face in curve cast on 76/88/100 long mouth chain 15 single_crochet back sew to face in curve k2 p2 for 9 rounds in blue quirked mouth chain 12 single_crochet back to last 3 sts half_double_crochet double_crochet tc sew to face in curve knit for 10/15/20 rounds in yellow hair knit for 8 rounds in black cut black to 10 inches 7 per hat knit for 0/3/8 rounds in yellow fold yarn in half pinching cut ends in one hand place k 9/9/8 k2tog on baby hat omit last k2tog in first fingertip in loop and start twirling the yarn keep going round until the loop gets tight on your finger bring cut ends knit a round still pinched to looped end to fold twisted yarn in half the yarn will twist on itself do not let go tie the cut repeat last two row decreasing one stitch in the row ends and the loop together in an overhand knot pull one repeat every time ex k8 k2tog k7 k2tog etc through the top of the hat with a crochet hook you can switch to dpn when needed secure these to the hat on the inside by sewing through once you are down to k2 k2tog omit the knit round each yarn hair and into the crown of the hat otherwise after it and decrease every round they will be easy to pull out
